channel.title: FLF - The Rebel Podcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: How to Win the World: Part 6: Lead Courageously with Dr. Joe Rigney [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
The sixth episode of The Ezra Institute's special series with the Rebels is one not to miss!
This week Dr. Joe Rigney joins the show to discuss how courageous leadership is necessary if we want to see the world won!
item.author: Pastor Nate & Chris - The Rebels
item.itunes:author: Pastor Nate & Chris - The Rebels

item.title: How to Win the World: Part 5: Practice Hospitality [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
Over our summer series "How to Win the World", P Nate and Pootie have the privilege to sit down with some amazing guests and discuss practical Christian commands that when faithfully obeyed push back darkness and cultivate Christian culture! Continue to join us as we learn how to put our hand to the plough in real tangible ways.

In this fourth episode the Rebels are joined by Author, Podcaster and all-round Christian influencer Rachel Jankovich to tackle the very important, often over-looked subject of Christian Hospitality!
item.author: pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels
item.itunes:author: pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels

item.title: How to Win the World, part 4: Recover Biblical Households with CR Wiley [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
This summer the Rebels are learning "How to Win the World" through a variety of guests discussing practical Christian theology and how it can apply to the immediate world around us. Continue to join us as we learn how to put our hand to the plough in real tangible ways.
 
In this fourth episode P Nate and Elder P are joined by Pastor/ Author CR Wiley of the Theology Pugcast to discuss how Christians can reclaim productive, anti-fragile, biblical households.
item.author: pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels
item.itunes:author: pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels
